TopicTitle: 1.0.5 Endless "Test J-20 Juno Basic jet Engine" missions

Articles.Content: After installing 1.0.5, and starting a new Hard-mode career game, I have been offered and completed the "Test J-20 Juno Basic jet Engine" mission 5 times in a row, and it's being offered again...

Is this the only contract currently available, and has your tech tree been modded?

Test contracts can repeat now, though not at first. It waits to repeat them until you have a decent amount of test subjects to choose from. Seeing as the Juno is a ways into the tech tree, you do have test subjects available, so it is choosing randomly from the available test subjects.

I'm not using the CommunityTech Tree, or any other tech tree mod.

I'm only 3 tiers into the tech tree on this new game.

If the code is "choosing randomly from a set of test subjects," I think I've found a bug when there is only a couple subjects to test. I suggest: "If mission X has been been completed twice in the last day of in-game time, don't offer mission X."
